provincial.translation[0].definitions[0]: relating to or coming from a province
provincial.translation[0].definitions[1]: relating to or coming from the parts of a country that are not near the capital
provincial.translation[0].definitions[2]: old-fashioned and not interested in anything new or different – used to show disapproval
provincial.translation[1].definitions[0]: someone who comes from a part of a country that is not near the capital, especially someone who is not interested in anything new or different – often used to show disapproval
